title: Tahm Kench Skin Idea / Request
body:
Hello Riot / everyone

I just wanted to propose a skin idea for Tahm Kench. 

Essentially it's 'Jaws' Tahm Kench ... he's a shark, a great white shark, with a massive head, big beady black eyes, exposed teeth and instead of his customary hat, he has the dorsal fin.

I see it as his head is most of his body, with arms and legs coming off it. 
so when he eats someone, he really chomps them shark style. 

If it was a legendary / ultimate skin ... he could say shark / jaws styled lines like "its not safe to go back into the water" and "you're going to need a bigger boat" and maybe even sing / play his tongue to the jaws "du duh, du duh" theme. 

I would call it "Shark Kench"

Hope that sounds of interest at least - thank you :)

replies.body: As a big Tahm Kench fan, I want this.

THIS IS AMAZING
YOU MY FRIEND ARE A LEGEND

I second this suggestion- Rito plz! 
However, if the jaws concept is not permitted due to legal copyright reasons, a skin with Tahm Kench wearing a clumsy 'left shark' costume would be pretty funny for April fools.
It sounds good but I think rito would need the maker of jaw 's permission to make a skin like this. Also I don't think tahm would be getting a skin any sooner now.

Yeah I figure make it similar enough  - like 'jedi' master Yi etc 

He needs another skin - though unlikely
I Quite Like This And I Am Willing To Help :) E.G Art Work {{champion:223}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
yeah sure - i can't draw to save myself - if you feel like it go nuts :)
